attributes.action: Do not Extend Lock Down! Bring back 3 tier system after 2nd December.
attributes.additional_details: I think it’s only fair that by the 2nd of December these restrictions we have on the current lockdown should only continue to apply to regions that still have high cases.Restrictions should be given and should be followed according to what tier your area is in.This way I believe people in their regions will try to bring cases down,follow the rules, and get back to their normal lives.Other regions in low tier should continue basic rules like wearing masks social distancing washin hands sanitising
attributes.background: Lock down should not be extended instead bring back the 3 tier system after the 2nd of December. There are regions across England  that are in tier 1. It is unfair that people with business in those regions have to go through a lock down right now. It is only fair on the regions that have low cases

rejection.details:
The Government has announced that a local restriction tier system will be in place from 2 December. See
https://www.gov.uk/guidance/local-restriction-tiers-what-you-need-to-know
